introParagraphs.1: A long time ago, when I was 16, I got my first experience programming as I had to modify videogames in Unity3D with the C# language
introParagraphs.2: I decided to test myself on a bigger challenge by diving in web development. Since 2023 I started developing websites by myself, first tackling off the Interface but as time went on I also developed APIs and server related functions.

stackDescs.1: to build APIs and server related functions

techDetails.note: If the client requires it, Laravel can be switched to Node.js (with Express.js framework).

projectList.0: A Trello like app, but with simplified panels and no need to login. User data is temporaly stored in cookies and can be downloaded and imported back into the app.
projectList.1: Chat app created in Laravel with the ability to create and join rooms. Takes advantage of using a MySQL database.

myProjects.warning: This project is still in development, check its progress in
